text: 200px This page shows the results of the Wrestling Competition at the 1997 Bolivarian Games, held in Arequipa, Peru. ==Men's competition== ===Greco- Roman=== {| border=1 cellpadding=3 cellspacing=0 style="border: 1px gray solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%" ! style="background:#efefef;" | event ! style="background:#efefef;" | gold ! style="background:#efefef;" | silver ! style="background:#efefef;" | bronze |- | 54 kg|| David Ochoa || Fredy Tineo|| Abel Contreras |- | 58 kg|| Víctor Capacho || Richard Corrales|| José Paico |- | 63 kg|| Enrique Cubas || Tomiaky Castillo|| Winston Santos |- | 69 kg|| José Escobar || José Alberto Díaz|| Fernando Navarro |- | 76 kg|| Antonio García || Luis Izquierdo|| Carlos Albrecht |- | 85 kg|| Eddy Bartolozzi || Sebastián Ruíz|| Lucio Vázquez |- | 97 kg|| Emilio Suárez || Arnulfo Hernández|| Félix Isisola |- | 125 kg|| Rafael Barreno || Juan Cruz|| Juan Giraldo |} ===Freestyle=== {| border=1 cellpadding=3 cellspacing=0 style="border: 1px gray solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%" ! style="background:#efefef;" | event ! style="background:#efefef;" | gold ! style="background:#efefef;" | silver ! style="background:#efefef;" | bronze |- | 54 kg|| José Barreto || Freddy Tineo|| Víctor Ledezma |- | 58 kg|| Luis Cortez || Davos Ortiz|| Edgar Castillo |- | 63 kg|| Enrique Cubas || Edison Hurtado|| Edy Azuaje |- | 69 kg|| Juan Suárez || David Cubas|| Leonardo González |- | 76 kg|| Lucas Barrera || Herminio Hidalgo|| Rafael Paredes |- | 85 kg|| José Meléndez || Félix Isisola|| Sebastián Ruíz |- | 97 kg|| Lucio Vázquez || Arnulfo Hernández|| Edgar Becerra |- | 125 kg|| Juan Giraldo ||Juan Cruz|| Juan García |} ==References== *Results database Category:Sports at the Bolivarian Games Category:1997 in sport wrestling Category:1997 Bolivarian Games Category:Wrestling in Peru
